operations.GetOrganizationRecommendation: Get a specific recommendation within an AWS Organizations organization. This API supports only prioritized recommendations.
operations.ListOrganizationRecommendationAccounts: Lists the accounts that own the resources for an organization aggregate recommendation. This API only supports prioritized recommendations.
operations.ListOrganizationRecommendationResources: List Resources of a Recommendation within an Organization. This API only supports prioritized recommendations.
operations.ListOrganizationRecommendations: List a filterable set of Recommendations within an Organization. This API only supports prioritized recommendations.
operations.UpdateOrganizationRecommendationLifecycl: Update the lifecyle of a Recommendation within an Organization. This API only supports prioritized recommendations.
operations.UpdateRecommendationLifecycle: Update the lifecyle of a Recommendation. This API only supports prioritized recommendations.

AccessDeniedException.base: Exception that access has been denied due to insufficient access

refs.ListOrganizationRecommendationResourcesR: An account affected by this organization recommendation

InternalServerException.base: Exception to notify that an unexpected internal error occurred during processing of the request
